name: Enshrine_LudumDare46
description:
Ludum Dare 46 Entry!

Download from https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/enshrine for the full, working version- this WebGL build does not display shaders correctly. The game works in the browser, but is not as pretty as it is if you download it.

Enshrine is a turned-based game about traveling up a mountain pass guarded by ancient stone watchers. Build and destroy walls to sneak your way passed these golems.
Get to the to the top of the mountain, and keep her memory alive

The game works best if you play full screen!

WASD or arrow keys to move
E to skip turn
Spacebar to enter wall-replace mode
WASD and arrows to move wall selection
Spacebar to select a wall
Spacebar again to place the wall into a new tile.
